overview: The two best friends, Helene and Theo, travel to Crete to reunite Helene with a past holiday romance. Life is great and the sky is the limit. But when the plan capsizes, the girls are faced with a new reality that they have to enter into together. Whether or not there is magic in the world is not important - what matters is whether you choose to believe there is.
title: Below the Waves, Above the Clouds
